Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Powers:
A Mighty Wind: (1 PP) R20" Sudden gust flings debris at target, inflicting 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6)) (see Bolt)
Clear Horizons: (3 PP) RTouch Target vision sharpens, giving +2 Notice within 20" and 5 mile vision for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target) (see Farsight)
Cloud Of Darkness: (2 PP) R10" Thick fog creates a 3" radius darkness for 3 rd (+1 PP Attaches to object or moves effect 10"/rd) (see Light/Darkness)
Fair Winds: (2 PP) RTouch Winds guide target's ranged attacks, giving +2 attack (Raise +4) w/thrown or projectile weapon for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target) (see Smite)
Wind Ward: (1 PP) R10" Swirling winds around target give +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP +4 Armor (Raise +6); +1 PP Target gains Toughness instead of Armor) (see Protection)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
